## koatty package

## Functions

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

[Bootstrap(bootFunc)](./koatty.bootstrap.md)


</td><td>

Bootstrap decorator for Koatty application class.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ComponentScan(scanPath)](./koatty.componentscan.md)


</td><td>

Component scan decorator for Koatty application. Scans the specified path(s) for components and registers them in the IOC container.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ConfigurationScan(scanPath)](./koatty.configurationscan.md)


</td><td>

Configuration scan decorator, used to scan and load configuration files.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createApplication(target, bootFunc)](./koatty.createapplication.md)


</td><td>

Create a fully initialized Koatty application WITHOUT starting a server.

Use this for: - Serverless deployment (AWS Lambda, Alibaba Cloud FC, Tencent SCF, etc.) - Custom server setup (attach handler to an existing HTTP server) - Testing (use app.getRequestHandler() with supertest)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ExecBootStrap(bootFunc)](./koatty.execbootstrap.md)


</td><td>

Decorator function for bootstrapping a Koatty application.


</td></tr>
